thread.title: Stocks: Over 1.6 Million Investor Accounts Added in 1 Year
thread.title_full: Stocks: Over 1.6 Million Investor Accounts Added in 1 Year

author: Moneylife Digital Team
title: Stocks: Over 1.6 Million Investor Accounts Added in 1 Year
text:
Follow @mldigital 
A strengthening securities market, backed by investor-friendly climate, has helped boost the number of investor depository accounts by 1.66 million, to nearly 240 million, in the past one year. The cumulative number of investor accounts with the country’s two depositories—NSDL (National Securities Depository Ltd) and CDSL (Central Depository Services Ltd)—stood at 237 million at the end of June 2015 compared with 220 million in June 2014. More in Moneylife
